1086760.name: Pinball FX3 - Williams™ Pinball: Volume 4
1086760.description:
This stunning collection of three authentic Williams™ tables includes WHITE WATER™, RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW™, and HURRICANE™. All available to play both in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- WHITE WATER: Ride the Spine Chiller down Insanity Falls, returning via the Boomerang Bend and passing through Big Foot's Cave. Just go with the flow!
- RED AND TED'S ROAD SHOW: Wreck roads across the U.S., from sea to shining sea. Make it to the California and visit up to 18 great American cities!
- HURRICANE: With all the thrills and chills of an amusement park, this table dazzles the crowd from pie-in-the-face antics and scoring hoopla to the revolving backglass wheel!
1086760.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
